components.name: Frontend Interface
components.description: The user-facing component that allows users to interact with the RAGFlow system, providing a graphical interface for input and output.

components.name: Backend Services
components.description: The core processing unit that handles requests, executes RAG workflows, and manages data processing and retrieval.

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores user data, configurations, and processed documents to support retrieval and generation tasks.

data_flows.description: User inputs are sent from the frontend to the backend for processing and retrieval.
Processed data and user configurations are stored in the database for future retrieval.
The backend retrieves necessary data from the database to fulfill user requests.

trust_boundaries.name: User Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary that separates user interactions from backend processing, ensuring that user data is handled securely.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary that protects stored data in the database from unauthorized access and ensures data integrity.
